Then please send all the links to Lucy and ask her if she wants us to do them on the Global site as well? Cheers

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body:
Hey Heath,

As discussed on our call, can we have the acoufelt.com/us/barrierback page to say

'We're sorry - the BarrierBack™ collection is currently unavailable in your region. To find out when this will become available, please contact us at customercare.usa@acoufelt.com'

Can we also change the au barrierback link from https://acoufelt.com/au/barrierback-acoufelt/ to acoufelt.com/au/barrierback. Could we also please add BarrierBack to this page: https://acoufelt.com/au/brands/

Thanks!

Warm regards,

Lucy Pittman
Marketing Manager
